description: Submission of details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 10 (Cycle Parking) of reserved matters permission reference 18/6337/RMA dated 18/03/2019 (as amended by 20/1209/NMA, 20/5693/NMA, 21/5982/NMA, 23/0621/NMA and 23/5027/NMA) for Plot 13 within the Phase 1C sub-phase of planning permission F/04687/13 dated 23/07/2014 for the comprehensive redevelopment of Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area. The application has been submitted in respect of the southern blocks (blocks E and F) within Plot 13 (known as Plot 203) and seeks approval for the residential cycle parking facilities at Ground floor level of Plot 203 only.
site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration AreaNorth West London
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
